department.ch: 土木工程學系營建管理碩士班
department.en: Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程本課程為提供營建管理專長涉及所有法律事務之入門介紹，其主要內容涵蓋公法、私法之基本法律知識、分析邏輯與應用在實際問題上之管理手法，本課程採法律抽象概念與實例共同穿插，並透過雙向討論之授課方式，達到學習之目的。
goal.en: "This course intends to interest the students with the subject of engineering law. The area of engineering law mostly is covered by civil laws, but is also influenced by other public laws, such as Government Procurement Law. The class will be directed by a set of notes and real-life examples. Substantial class discussions are expected."

outline.ch: 課程簡介 工程法律體系 工程私法導論：民法與契約法概念 工程私法導論：民事特別法 工程公法導論：關係「人」之法律 工程公法導論：關係「事」之法律（一） 工程公法導論：關係「事」之法律（二） 訴訟程序法導論 證據法導論
outline.en: "This course covers civil laws, including the concept, and other specific purpose laws. Some public laws which govern the area of engineering will also be introuced."
